obj_furn_rock_1.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_1.description: My furniture options are a bit limited now that I live in a cave, but I’ll make the most of it.

obj_furn_rock_2.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_2.description: Designing with rocks is like a creative challenge. How exciting!

obj_furn_rock_3.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_3.description: Having rock furniture is worth it if I don’t have to have social interactions anymore.

obj_furn_rock_4.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_4.description: Buddha didn’t need material possessions and neither do I.

obj_furn_rock_5.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_5.description: Maybe I can paint these rocks pink.

obj_furn_rock_7.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_7.description: This rock is kinda cute, who needs normal furniture.

obj_furn_rock_8.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_8.description: I’m gonna call this one rock-tan, te he!

obj_furn_rock_9.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_9.description: Maybe living in a cave was a mistake...

obj_furn_rock_10.title: Rocks
obj_furn_rock_10.description: What am I doing with my life.

obj_furn_snow_lump_1.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_1.description: This is just the rocks all over again.

obj_furn_snow_lump_2.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_2.description: At least these are softer than the rocks.

obj_furn_snow_lump_3.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_3.description: Snow can easily be formed into a chair.

obj_furn_snow_lump_4.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_4.description: I don’t have to stockpile water anymore now that I have so much snow!

obj_furn_snow_lump_5.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_5.description: Life hack: lumps of snow make for great pillows.

obj_furn_snow_lump_6.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_6.description: You get a snow lump, you get a snow lump, you get a snow lump, everybody gets a snow lump!

obj_furn_snow_lump_7.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_7.description: I’m starting to miss the rocks.

obj_furn_snow_lump_10.title: Snow Lump
obj_furn_snow_lump_10.description: Really, what am I doing with my life?

obj_furn_bed.title: Bed
obj_furn_bed.description: This is where I spend most of my life.

obj_furn_dakimakura.title: Dakimakura
obj_furn_dakimakura.description: This is a totally normal body pillow. Don’t flip it over though.

obj_furn_dresser.title: Dresser
obj_furn_dresser.description: Who knows what might be inside.

obj_furn_kotatsu.title: Kotatsu
obj_furn_kotatsu.description: I could stay under here for days. Actually, I have.

obj_furn_cactus.title: Cactus
obj_furn_cactus.description: Don’t be mad at a cactus if it pokes you, It can’t help it.

obj_furn_snake_plant.title: Snake Plant
obj_furn_snake_plant.description: Luckily, there are no actual snakes in this plant.

obj_furn_flamingo.title: Flamingo
obj_furn_flamingo.description: Hopefully flamingo-chan will scare away people like a guard dog.

obj_furn_tissues.title: Tissues
obj_furn_tissues.description: You can’t get sick if you never go outside!

obj_furn_microwave.title: Microwave
obj_furn_microwave.description: A microwave is a complete kitchen when all you eat is ramen!

obj_furn_window.title: Window
obj_furn_window.description: Please don’t use that! Someone might look inside.

obj_furn_calendar.title: Calendar
obj_furn_calendar.description: I’ve gone almost three months without going outside. A new record!

obj_furn_computer.title: Computer
obj_furn_computer.description: This is where I keep my life.

obj_furn_buddha.title: Buddha Statue
obj_furn_buddha.description: Buddha understood what it was like to live in isolation.

obj_furn_fox.title: Fox Statue
obj_furn_fox.description: Like having a dog but without all the annoying responsibilities.

obj_furn_rake.title: Rake
obj_furn_rake.description: What patterns should I make in the zen garden?

obj_furn_poster_1.title: Poster
obj_furn_poster_1.description: No hikikomori’s room is complete without cute posters!

obj_furn_snowballs.title: Snowballs
obj_furn_snowballs.description: I guess this is better than more snow lumps.

obj_furn_shovel.title: Shovel
obj_furn_shovel.description: Shovel away the snow to get to more snow.

obj_furn_sled.title: Sled
obj_furn_sled.description: Who am I kidding, Im too lazy to actually use this.

obj_furn_cake.title: Cake
obj_furn_cake.description: I want it to feel like christmas all year!

obj_furn_chicken.title: Fried Chicken
obj_furn_chicken.description: It feels like christmas all year here in the arctic.

obj_furn_fishing.title: Fishing Pole
obj_furn_fishing.description: I’ll find something to eat other than ramen

obj_furn_daruma.title: Daruma Doll
obj_furn_daruma.description: I’ll draw the other eye when I’ve overcome my social anxiety.

obj_furn_plush_bear.title: Teddy Bear
obj_furn_plush_bear.description: No, I’m not too old for stuffed animals.

obj_furn_plush_bear_white.title: Teddy Polar Bear
obj_furn_plush_bear_white.description: Actually just a regular stuffed bear that’s been in the snow for a while.

obj_furn_plush_roll.title: Sushi Roll Plush
obj_furn_plush_roll.description: What’s better to cuddle with than food?

obj_furn_plush_tanuki.title: Tanuki Plush
obj_furn_plush_tanuki.description: I’m glad this tanuki plush doesn’t include the balls.

obj_furn_plush_fugu.title: Fugu Plush
obj_furn_plush_fugu.description: Puffy and soft unlike the real thing.

obj_furn_cart.title: Video Games
obj_furn_cart.description: They don’t make games like they used to.

obj_furn_figure_1.title: Figure
obj_furn_figure_1.description: This figure has a detachable Skirt! Not that I ever use it...

obj_furn_figure_2.title: Figure
obj_furn_figure_2.description: I just use this figure for drawing reference. It’s not sexual, I swear.

obj_furn_dirty_clothes.title: Dirty Clothes
obj_furn_dirty_clothes.description: Ok, maybe I’m a little messy but I still don’t like the stereotypes.

obj_furn_pantsu.title: Pantsu
obj_furn_pantsu.description: No need to hunt for them, they’re right here!

obj_furn_lantern.title: Lantern
obj_furn_lantern.description: It has my name on it.

obj_furn_pillow.title: Pillow
obj_furn_pillow.description: What, a pillow without anime girls on it?

obj_furn_shamisen.title: Shamisen
obj_furn_shamisen.description: I’ll finally have the time to learn an instrument now that I don’t have to worry about people.

obj_furn_coffee_1.title: Canned Coffee
obj_furn_coffee_1.description: Filled with milk and sugar. I can almost taste the coffee!

obj_furn_coffee_2.title: Black Coffee
obj_furn_coffee_2.description: A bitter drink for grown ups.

obj_furn_water_jug.title: Water Jug
obj_furn_water_jug.description: I have to stock up on water so I am able to make instant ramen.

obj_furn_ac.title: Air Conditioner
obj_furn_ac.description: I keep the air very cold so I have a good excuse to never get out of bed.

obj_furn_umbrella.title: Umbrella
obj_furn_umbrella.description: My skin is really sensitive from never getting any sun.

obj_furn_tv.title: CRT TV
obj_furn_tv.description: The proper way to play games.

obj_furn_laptop.title: Laptop
obj_furn_laptop.description: A portable computer. Like for when you’re in bed.

obj_furn_zen_garden.title: Zen Garden
obj_furn_zen_garden.description: My plants can’t survive in a cave but that doesn’t mean I can’t have a garden.

obj_furn_ramen_stock_1.title: Ramen Supply
obj_furn_ramen_stock_1.description: The only food a person needs.

obj_furn_power_generator.title: Power Generator
obj_furn_power_generator.description: With this I can live comfortably anywhere!

obj_furn_cat.title: Lucky Cat
obj_furn_cat.description: I feel lucky when no one tries to talk to me.

obj_furn_clock.title: Clock
obj_furn_clock.description: It counts how much of my life I’ve wasted.
